titles.title: Enhanced Oversight and Accountability in Screening Act
Enhanced Oversight and Accountability in Screening Act
Enhanced Oversight and Accountability in Screening Act

A bill to ensure a timely, fair, meaningful, and transparent process for individuals to seek redress because they were wrongly identified as a threat under the screening and inspection regimes used by the Department of Homeland Security, to require a report on the effectiveness of enhanced screening programs of the Department of Homeland Security, and for other purposes.
